title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms
tosdr.tldr: The Privacy Policy states that "We may amend or terminate any terms of this Agreement at any time and such amendment or termination will be effective at the time we post the revised terms on the site. We'll strive to make these terms understandable. You can tell when we last revised this agreement by looking at the “last revised” date at the top of this Agreement. Your continued use of the site or services after we've posted revised terms signifies your acceptance of the revised terms."
